body:
My latest commit to pr #1379 is failing unit tests:

==> Error: the constraint 'None' matches multiple packages, and this is not allowed in this context
mpileaks@2.3%clang@3.3~debug~opt+shared+static arch=linux-debianwheezy-x86_64
mpileaks@2.3%clang@3.3~debug~opt+shared+static arch=linux-debianwheezy-x86_64
mpileaks@2.3%clang@3.3~debug~opt+shared+static arch=linux-debianwheezy-x86_64
==> Error: the constraint 'None' match no package, and this is not allowed in this context

I did a rebase off of develop this morning.
title: unit tests failing with "Error: the constraint 'None' matches multiple packages, and this is not allowed in this context"
